response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
AFFIDAVIT OF JOHN DOE
State of New York
County of Kings

John Doe, being duly sworn, deposes and says:

1. I am over 18 years of age and competent to make this affidavit.

2. I have personal knowledge of the facts set forth in this affidavit.

3. On June 1, 2023, I witnessed the motor vehicle accident that occurred at the intersection of Main St. and 1st Ave. in Brooklyn, NY.

4. I saw a blue sedan, traveling northbound on 1st Ave., run the red light and collide with a green minivan that was proceeding through the intersection on Main St. 

5. The force of the impact caused the minivan to roll over onto its side.

6. I immediately called 911 to report the accident and request emergency assistance.

7. I remained at the scene and provided a statement to the responding police officers.

FURTHER AFFIANT SAYETH NAUGHT.

____________________
John Doe

Sworn to before me this 
15th day of June, 2023

____________________
Notary Public
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
